Class CirclePanel.Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • drawing.CirclePanel.Circle

    CirclePanel
    private static class CirclePanel.Circle
extends java.lang.Object
    Internal class containing properties of the circle drawn in the CirclePanel

      • grow

        private void grow​(double x)
        Increase the diameter of the circle
        Parameters:

      • getRelativeAngle

        private double getRelativeAngle​(java.awt.Point p)
        Calculates the angle (with respect to the +x axis) of the line joining the centre of the circle to the specified point.
        Parameters:
        p - the point
        Returns:
        the angle of p with respect to +x axis in degrees between 0 and 360 degrees
